review: We love it,been watching movies nearly every night
author: Judy Freeman

review: Easy to use easy to connect.
author: Jessica A McLaughlin

review: love it works as promised ..put kodi on it..love it
author: carol richards

review: Decent user interface and selection of apps.  Purchased mainly for HBOGo and Netflix which were easy to set up.  Only complaint is this:  my laptop and cell phone can stream off of the wi-fi signal in the same room as the TV/FireStick...but FireStick streaming lasts for all of 5 seconds then stops.  I am going to have to either move my wireless router (buy extension cords) or get a signal booster ($$).  Pretty annoying!!
author: Lauren

review: Way exceeded my expectations.  I should have purchased a long time ago.  Highly recommended.  Makes watching all the prime stuff so easy.
author: s Brown

review: I preorderd a when it was $20. Awesome buy. I do not use it as my primary streaming device, but pack it along for vacations. The quality quality has been great everywhere we've had a decent wifi signal. Wish it had an Acorn Media app, but other than that I love it.
author: B. Larsen

review: Love it....It's everything i hoped for...
author: constance
